title: Poster, "The Museum of Sketches..."
medium: Screen print on brown wove paper with a simulated "laid paper" pattern
signed: Verso: lower right corner in ball-point pen: "K G OLSSON  VIRVELVINDSVAGEN 4L 222 27 LUND SWEDEN"
description:
Text block in black goudy font, all caps centered on brown paper. The text consists of the title of an exhibition, the museum where it was held, address and phone number followed by the names of the artists/graphic designers included in the exhibition.
Text reads: THE MUSEUM OF SKETCHES/ LE MUSEE DES ESQUISSES DAS/SKIZZEN MUSEUM SKISSERNAS/MUSEUM FINNGATAN 2 LUND/SWEDEN TEL 046 2227283-88/ARP BAERTLING BAZAINE YAN/EUGEN MOORE GLEIZES WIPP/RENQVIST PICASSO ERIXSON/RIVERA MARKSLUND DUFY PAN/GIANAKOS LEGER OLSON GAN/NEMES VASARELY UBAC MIRO/OLDENBURG PERNEVI KLEEN/ROLFSEN MILLES BOURDELLE/KIRKEBY CALDER SIQUEIROS/DERKERT JACOBSEN NIHLEN/O'GORMAN GRUNEWALD ERRO/HICKSGILIOLO RODHE DENIS/DELAUNY BEJEMARK KROHG/LINDBLOM MORNER SIEGARD/IBRATALL DUBUFFET MATTA/POMODORO MATISSE HULTEN/BONNIER CORNEILLE JONES/NORDSTROM REUTERS WARD/VANNI FOGELQUIST OSTMAR/LE CORBUSIER BACKSTROM/SZEKELY HJERTEN CHRISTO

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "The Museum of Sketches...". Screen print on brown wove paper with a simulated "laid paper" pattern. 
Gift of K.G. Olsson. 1999-30-1
